insert into load_scan_record (task_id, waybill_code,end_site_code, end_site_name,create_site_name,create_site_code,package_code, board_code, scan_action, transfer, flow_disaccord, force_status, create_user_code, create_user_name, update_user_code, update_user_name, create_time, update_time, yn, ts) VALUES
(#{info.taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{info.wayBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.endSiteCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{info.endSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.createSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.createSiteCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{info.packageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.boardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.scanAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.transfer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.flowDisaccord,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.forceStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info.createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.updateUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{info.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{info.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1, now(3))
mapper.select: select package_code from load_scan_record where yn = 1 and task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and board_code = #{boardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update load_scan_record set force_status = 1 where yn = 1 and task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and waybill_code = #{wayBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update load_scan_record set yn=0 where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and yn = 1
